display_long_description:
TACTICA: First Contact is an immersive sci-fi tabletop turn-based strategy game designed for VR/MR. As a captain of an elite squad, you are tasked with suppressing an alien rebellion across human colonies. But as the conflict deepens, a mysterious force threatens the entire galaxy. Every decision you make on the battlefield could determine the future.


# Tabletop Strategy Reimagined for VR and MR:
Step into TACTICA and discover the thrill of classic tabletop gaming in an entirely new dimension. From your elevated vantage point in VR or MR, you’ll command your squad through strategic, turn-based battles where every choice impacts the outcome. Playing TACTICA in mixed reality instantly transports you back to those childhood afternoons spent orchestrating epic tabletop battles.

[media]

# Skill Card System
TACTICA’s unique skill card system shapes your squad’s combat tactics. Harness a mix of offensive and defensive skill cards to outmaneuver foes and unleash devastating attacks. 
[media]
# Story Campaign
In TACTICA: First Contact, the galaxy is on the brink of collapse. Human expansion has ignited an alien rebellion in the colonies, and as a captain, your mission is to suppress the uprising. But as the battle unfolds, a darker and more dangerous force emerges, threatening not just the colonies but the entire solar system. It’s up to you to stop the rebellion and face this looming threat head-on.



[media]

# Skill Card System
TACTICA’s unique skill card system shapes your squad’s combat tactics. Harness a mix of offensive and defensive skill cards to outmaneuver foes and unleash devastating attacks.

# Story Campaign
In TACTICA: First Contact, the galaxy is on the brink of collapse. Human expansion has ignited an alien rebellion in the colonies, and as a captain, your mission is to suppress the uprising. But as the battle unfolds, a darker and more dangerous force emerges, threatening not just the colonies but the entire solar system. It’s up to you to stop the rebellion and face this looming threat head-on.
